coverage_details.accommodation: Single Room (Standard suite covered up to 4,000 SAR)
coverage_details.std: Covered, including Nongonococcal urethritis, Trichomoniasis, HIV, Syphilis, Human Papillomavirus (genital warts), Neisseria gonorrhoeae, Genital herpes, Chancroid
coverage_details.checkup: Adult vaccinations, checkup and family doctors covered as per National Health Services (Weqaya) guidelines
coverage_details.vaccination: Covered as per MOH schedule up to SR 9,999,999.99; Children up to 6 years old according to MOH guidelines and RSV vaccination
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frames covered up to 2,000 SAR with 20% up to 100 SAR deductible; Frames covered twice for children up to 14 years old
coverage_details.birth_control: Cost of birth control for females covered up to SR 1,500; Contraceptive methods for pregnancy covered up to 1,500 SAR (not for Parents scheme)
coverage_details.obesity_surgery_bmi_over_35: Overall surgical obesity treatment coverage is 20,000 SAR if BMI ≥ 40 or BMI ≥ 35 with complications; Covered procedures include LAGB, Sleeve Gastrectomy, Roux-En-Y Bypass, Mini Gastric Bypass, BPD Scopinaro, Banding removal, conversions, and revisions
coverage_details.obesity_surgery_bmi_over_40: Overall surgical obesity treatment coverage is 20,000 SAR if BMI ≥ 40 or BMI ≥ 35 with complications
coverage_details.kidney_transplant: Covered up to SR 250,000 per insurance period
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Surgery for donor covered up to SR 50,000
coverage_details.neonatal_screening: National program for early detection for newborns covered up to SR 100,000; Cost of neonatal metabolic screening covered up to SR 100,000
coverage_details.psychiatric: Up to SR 50,000 per annum (both general and non-acute), up to 4 visits for non-acute
coverage_details.hearing_aids_audiometry: Hearing aid covered up to SR 6,000; Newborn hearing screening program covered up to SR 100,000
coverage_details.dental_general: SR 5,000; Crowns, bridges, pins and posts for crowns; Scaling covered once/year; 20% copay up to 100 SR
coverage_details.dental_corrective: Crowns and bridges up to dental limit (5,000 SAR)
coverage_details.neo_natal_care: Premature babies care covered up to annual limit; Coverage of newborns under mother’s policy for up to 30 days
coverage_details.newborn_disability_screening: National program for early detection for congenital heart anomalies covered up to SR 100,000
coverage_details.congenital: Acute congenital illnesses covered up to annual limit; Non-acute congenital illness covered up to SR 50,000
coverage_details.maternity: Antenatal care and NVD covered up to SR 15,000; Maternity complications, Caesarian section, and legal abortion covered up to annual limit; Not covered for Parents
coverage_details.optical: SR 2,000; Frames and contact lenses; Frames for children up to 14 years covered twice
coverage_details.screening: National program for early detection of newborns, hearing, heart anomalies up to SR 100,000; General family doctor and adult screening included
coverage_details.disability_cases: Including neonatal metabolic screening covered up to SR 100,000
coverage_details.donor_organ_harvesting: Surgery of donor (organ harvesting) covered up to SR 50,000
coverage_details.physiotherapy: Covered up to annual limit; Rehabilitation and artificial limbs up to SR 100,000
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Standard pre-authorization applies. Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Companion cost covered for all members and parents. Pre-existing and existing chronic conditions with medications are covered. Transportation of mortal remains covered up to SR 10,000. All joint replacement surgeries up to SR 50,000. Local ambulance covered. Allergy tests/treatment covered if prescribed. Intensive care covered. Psoriasis treatment covered. Infectious diseases requiring isolation at MOH hospitals covered. Home healthcare included for specific medical needs (wound care, catheter, IV fluids post-surgery). Telemedicine covered. International SOS assistance is covered for medical evacuation into KSA. Medical devices for diabetes, pressure disorders covered. Nutritional/vitamin/mineral supplements covered if medically necessary and SFDA/physician prescribed.
